source:
// ------------------- TRANSFORMATION POPULATION -----------------

// LECTURE FICHIER PARQUET 
val population = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/population")

// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES
val population_supp_colonnes = population.drop("SEX")
val population_filtre_pays = population_supp_colonnes.filter(population_supp_colonnes("LOCATION").isin(listepays:_*))

val population_less_15 = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "LESS_15_SHARE")
val population_less_15_clean = population_less_15.withColumnRenamed("value","MOINS_15_ANS").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")


// CREATION DE 3 TABLES POUR CHAQUE VALEURS DE AGE + CHANGEMENT NOM COLONNES
val population_15_64 = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "15-64_SHARE")
val population_15_64_clean = population_15_64.withColumnRenamed("value","15-64_ANS").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

val population_65_plus = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "65_OVER_SHARE")
val population_65_plus_clean = population_65_plus.withColumnRenamed("value","PLUS_64_ANS").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

val population_totale = population_filtre_pays.filter(population_supp_colonnes("AGE") === "TOTAL")
val population_totale_clean = population_totale.withColumnRenamed("value","NB_HABITANTS").drop("AGE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

// JOINTURES
val population_less_64 = population_less_15_clean.join(population_15_64_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner")
val population_full = population_less_64.join(population_65_plus_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner")
val population_clean = population_full.join(population_totale_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner").withColumnRenamed("LOCATION","PAYS").withColumnRenamed("TIME_PERIOD","ANNEE")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
population_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/population")

// Transformation pib
val pib = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/pib")


// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES


val pib_supp_colonnes = pib.drop("TRANSACT")
val pib_filtre_pays = pib_supp_colonnes.filter(pib_supp_colonnes("LOCATION").isin(listepays:_*))

val pib_total = pib_filtre_pays.filter(pib_supp_colonnes("MEASURE") === "CPC")
val pib_par_hab = pib_filtre_pays.filter(pib_supp_colonnes("MEASURE") === "HCPC")


val pib_total_clean = pib_total.withColumnRenamed("value","PIB(Millions_Dollards)").drop("MEASURE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")
val pib_par_hab_clean = pib_par_hab.withColumnRenamed("value","PIB_PAR_HAB").drop("MEASURE").orderBy("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD")

val pib_clean = pib_total_clean.join(pib_par_hab_clean, Seq("LOCATION","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner").withColumnRenamed("LOCATION","PAYS").withColumnRenamed("TIME_PERIOD","ANNEE").orderBy("PAYS","ANNEE")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
pib_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/pib")

// Transformation couverturesociale
val couverturesociale = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/couverturesociale")

// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES
val couverturesociale_supp_colonnes = couverturesociale.drop("VAR")
val couverturesociale_filtre_pays = couverturesociale_supp_colonnes.filter(couverturesociale_supp_colonnes("COU").isin(listepays:_*))

val couverturesociale_nb_personnes = couverturesociale_filtre_pays.filter(couverturesociale_supp_colonnes("UNIT") === "EFFPEREF")
val couverturesociale_pop = couverturesociale_filtre_pays.filter(couverturesociale_supp_colonnes("UNIT") === "TOTPOPTX")


val couverturesociale_nb_personnes_clean = couverturesociale_nb_personnes.withColumnRenamed("value","POPULATION_COUVERTE(Milliers_personnes)").withColumnRenamed("COU","PAYS").drop("UNIT").orderBy("PAYS","TIME_PERIOD")
val couverturesociale_pop_clean = couverturesociale_pop.withColumnRenamed("value","POPULATION_COUVERTE(%)").withColumnRenamed("COU","PAYS").drop("UNIT").orderBy("PAYS","TIME_PERIOD")


val couverturesociale_clean = couverturesociale_nb_personnes_clean.join(couverturesociale_pop_clean, Seq("PAYS","TIME_PERIOD"), "inner").withColumnRenamed("TIME_PERIOD","ANNEE").orderBy("PAYS","ANNEE")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
couverturesociale_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/couverturesociale")

// Transformation depensesociale
val depensesociale = spark.read.parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/depensessociales")

// SUPPRESSION COLONNES + FILTRE PAYS ETUDIES
val depensesociale_supp_colonnes = depensesociale.drop("SOURCE","BRANCH","TYPEXP","TYPROG","UNIT")

val depensesociale_filtre_pays = depensesociale_supp_colonnes
    .filter(depensesociale_supp_colonnes("COUNTRY")
    .isin(listepays:_*))

val depensesociale_clean = depensesociale_filtre_pays
    .withColumnRenamed("value","DEPENSES_SOCIALES(%_PIB)")
    .withColumnRenamed("COUNTRY","PAYS")
    .withColumnRenamed("TIME_PERIOD","ANNEE")
    .orderBy("PAYS","ANNEE")

// ENREGISTREMENT .PARQUET => ARGENT
depensesociale_clean.write.mode("overwrite").parquet("abfss://ocde@groupeocde.dfs.core.windows.net/argent/depensessociales")
